title: Episode 28 (LIVE): The Psychological Benefits of Dance
itunes:author: UW-Green Bay Psychology Department
itunes:summary: In this episode, Dr. Ryan Martin and Allee Schramm talk with Mina and MIchael Witte, dance instructors and owners of Simply Ballroom LLC.  The four of us discuss the various emotional and cognitive benefits of dance, take questions from the audience, and play a little game of "Dancing with the... Who?"
itunes:subtitle: In this episode, Dr. Ryan Martin and Allee Schramâ€¦
description: In this episode, Dr. Ryan Martin and Allee Schramm talk with Mina and MIchael Witte, dance instructors and owners of Simply Ballroom LLC.  The four of us discuss the various emotional and cognitive benefits of dance, take questions from the audience, and play a little game of "Dancing with the... Who?"
